name: calculator
description: Evaluate a mathematical expression and return the numeric result.

expression.description: The mathematical expression to evaluate, e.g. '2 + 3 * 4'

name: python_interpreter
description: Execute Python code and return the printed output or result.

name: web_search
description: Search the web for up-to-date information and return relevant results.

name: translator
description: Translate text from one language to another.

target_language.description: The target language for translation, e.g. 'French', 'Korean'
